website_summaries.verdict: TaoTronics has put together an impressive package with the Soundliberty 53 earbuds. The audio performance is strong across a wide range of music styles, video syncing is accurate, waterproofing is better than many of its rivals, as is battery life. The only spoiler is the touch-sensitive controls, which can be erratic at times. Stroking rather than tapping helped, so if you adopt that technique then these earbuds could be an excellent buy.
pros: Great sound, above average battery life, and decent waterproofing

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Very good sound quality, especially for this price range - Good bass, clear mids and highs - Rock solid Bluetooth connection, not even once broke up or skipped - Real life Bluetooth connection 12-ish metres indoors (with walls in between), 20-ish metres outdoors - Good battery life - Very good fit in ears, they never want to fall out (push them in a bit harder for even better fit and more bass) - Amazing value for money (I bought them when they were on sale) Cons: - A slight hissing (only audible when listening to audiobooks, guided meditation or silent parts of classical music), but it's lot less than similar price range earbuds usually produce
customer_reviews.author: IWantSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Serious connection issues
customer_reviews.text: The headphones don’t connect to each other unless they are taken out at exactly the same time. Every time the headphones are taken out of the case I have to forget the device on my iPhone, turn off the Bluetooth and then pair them again, which is very frustrating. Also the instructions say that you can put the right earphone away in the box and then when you tak it out they will reconnect, they don’t. I again have to put both headphones back in the box, take them out at exactly the same time and re do the connection as mentioned before. This is very disappointing from this brand as it used their products before and they were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: aiden murphy

customer_reviews.title: Budget superstar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a cheaper pair of Bluetooth in-ears for my commute. What does a few extra pounds get you over cheaper Bluetooth headphones? In short pretty excellent all round performance. Being critical the bass seems a touch over emphasised, but treble clarity is excellent - certainly more detailed than my previous pair but without seeming harsh or over-emphasised. I can’t discuss the sweat or water-proofing as it hasn’t rained and I don’t gym. Charging and set up is simple. Packaging is nice without being overly fussy and includes everything you need to adjust fit and fully charge everything. For under £50 you can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Generally good. But does a weird amplification of some background noises.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my ear comfortably and give good sound quality for music, films etc. Charger box is nice and small. Other bluetooth earbuds I've tried have randomly cut out a lot while walking or turning my head, these have not yet done that (been using these for just over a week, others did it immediately). Only downside I've found is they somehow amplify rustling background noises, for example while I'm on the train commuting, I can quite loudly hear papers and plastic bags being rustled by others louder than I would hear them without the headphones. It's not a show stopper, but can get annoying sometimes if there is someone doing a lot of rustling!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, garbage microphone
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Contacted seller and they sent a replacement on which the microphone works. Excellent customer service and a truly great product especially considering the price. Sound quality is amazing, especially for the price. Clear top and defined bass. Battery life is also excellent, have used them for a couple of hours at a time and still shows 60% on the phone. case charges well. Occasionally the right one doesn't connect, but pop back in the case take out again and fine. But, the microphone is useless. Can't take or make a call as the other party can't understand you. A real shame as can't fault them otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Amazing Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 5 days now and used for 3 hours per day and still plenty of battery charge left. The sound quality is very good and connects easily to both my android and ios devices. At night, there is an intermittent flashing white light on each ear bud that may irritate. Depends on what music app you use as to adjustment of bass / treble etc... Tapping the left ear bud lowers volume and the right ear bud highers volume. Double taps, tropiole tap and long press all add functions like stop, next track etc..
customer_reviews.author: Michael German

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. They are comfortable. The sound quality is much better than I expected. It's really solid with a great bass. I learned using them that you make adjustment in your ear using the stalk not the in ear bit otherwise you can change track or volume accidentally. Funny things can happen if you are in an environment where there's lots of Bluetooth going on like on a bus or train. They may disconnect. I've had odd experiences with weird sound after going well out of range but easily fixed with return to charger unit. From the pictures I wasn't expecting the case/ charger to be so tiny. This is good.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmac

customer_reviews.title: Updated #2! Easy setup, good sound, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as his new phone has no earphone jacks. We set it up very easily on Bluetooth and he is very pleased with the sound. He uses the smallest cups and they fit his smallish ears very well. Great value. 2 week update. Good reliable connection. Happy with battery life and sound. 4 month review. My son uses this daily. He's really happy with it. He uses it to listen to music and uses the mic to facetime with his cousin. No issues at all. I'll continue to update on durability and battery life. Please take a second to hit the helpful button. It makes writing these reviews and constantly updating them worthwhile. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ACTY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Positives: good fit in the ear, price, delivery times Negatives: sound drops in one of the earbuds about every 25 minutes, sound clarity is not that good as advertised but satisfactory for the price, microphone is rubbish because the other person on the phone almost can't understand or hear you so you have to take on earbud out and hold it in front of your mouth while speaking-also not as advertised... Bought these hoping to be better than my enacfire but I was wrong... Verdict: over rated and worse than older wired taotronics headphones.
customer_reviews.author: jonis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pair of Anecfire wireless earphones previously and the sound quality of these Tautronics ones is noticeably superior. Pairing and setup very easy, I have only come across pairing issues once with the right earpiece. I have been using for two weeks both earphones work for music and calls. However, the other side hears a lot of echo during phone calls, so you need to be in a very quiet room in order to be able to use these for phone calls. Another criticism is the charging box/bay feels a bit light and flimsy compared to other products at the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Berkan Sesen

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because they weren't as expensive as some of the other brand and the brand was well known. Started having problems from day 1 despite casual occasional use. Then the earpeice started to split and fall apart after only a few months. so annoyed had high expectations for taotronic branded budget earphone. These earphones are not for long term keep. It's more for only a few months at most. Then you will inevitably have to buy new ones all over again. Another major issue I had is that the right secondary earpiece kept losing connection and skipped sound. I had to shake it couple of times to get it back online.
customer_reviews.author: Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! £100 earphones at 1/3 of the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for its price: Great sound, crystal clear and solid, with concrete bass. Good bi-directional communication. Very nice design. I have now used it with very challenging applications we use at work for conferencing, which usually present with audio/video challenges (increased noise, bumpy bluetooth etc.) and it works wonders. A really great customer service which was extremely helpful and responsive and painlessly solved the issues I initially had (for this reason I have updated this review). It's my second happy Taotronics purchase, and it's going to be the first brand I will be checking for our future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pairing difficulty, but good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: After, 2 months the earphones stopped pairing to each other. I tried all the factory resets and scoured forums, but nothing worked. It was a shame as despite being a bit clunky, the sound was good for inexpensive bluetooth earphones. Update - I got a replacement under warranty which paired first time no problems - Good customer service from EU Noda seller. I also received an offer of money back or a voucher from Taotronics, so in all I now have good Bluetooth earphones working well and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Vee Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wow these work very well
customer_reviews.text: It can be a little tricky to initially pair them (nothing too bad just maybe a few attempts), once they are paired they work seamlessly and provide fantastic sound. The ear pod sits in my ear very well and seals off the sound around me (including my own voice which makes it difficult to talk when the music has stopped without pulling one out of my ear). The small case is really neat and compact and is more than just a case as it hold further charge when needed. I went for a 2 hour walk and had no issues, the phone keeps track of the available charge so you shouldn't get caught out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: As good as Airpods but 1/6th of the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for some good quality, easy to use Bluetooth earbuds for my iPhone for a while now. I eventually purchased these TaoTronics. Wow how right I was !!! They are great. The pillbox size case they sit in is small and light and fits easily in your pocket without any bulging. The case charges the earbuds and provides more battery life should the buds run dry. They are simple to setup, easy to use and the sound quality is great. Good bass and good clear sounds. These are 1/6th the price of the Apple buds and for the price the TaoTronics are excellent value for money. Buy them, you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price, microphone useless.
customer_reviews.text: Not amazing, but they work pretty well. The sound quality is not the best but it's acceptable. The left earphone acts as the master and the right as a slave. The microphone is pretty much useless. People couldn't hear me properly when using them even in a quiet room. One of the earphones will occasionally disconnect but will reconnect almost immediately. The controls are not great. Pressing 3 times to skip a song is not very useful as it is easy to not press exactly the same spot 3 times especially when walking or running. It sometimes just recognizes one or two of the 3 and those are different functions.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really fault these tbh. For the price they're amazing. They need bedded in, but once done the sound quality is warm, whilst still giving enough treble. Battery life is also very good, and dependant on how long you use them, you should get enough for 2-3 days worth out of the case. They don't isolate as much noise as I'd like, but I wouldn't expect it to be perfect for the price. I'd maybe get a cord to tie them together as I lost the left one when I fell off my bike. Obviously this isn't a fault of the headphones, it would happen with any wireless set.
customer_reviews.author: El Presidenté

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Sound and base for cheap Bluetooth earphone like this is great. Pairing was also relatively simple although I lost connection a couple of times. After putting it back in the case and pairing again it was fine. The case is small, easy to open and the earphones stayed in magnetically. The touch controls are not very intuitive. Tapping the earphones rarely picked up your command unless doing it very hard. Other times it would pick up your correct command properly, switching from volume up/down, pausing and skipping tracks. Overall this let the earphones down and had to return these as they were not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Gekko

customer_reviews.title: Great ones after a long time !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use at the gym(and use Bose for travel) and extremely happy with them. Old ones I had didn't fit good and kept falling out and really irritated me. These fit comfortably and don't fall out. Clear and crisp sound. It's not easy to find ear pods that work great without shelling out an arm and a leg these days BUT these work amazing and very affordable!! I definitely will purchase again should the need arise and definitely will recommend to all my friends and family. Thank you for having top quality product at a very affordable price! Customer for life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anand Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Returned for refund. Left earpiece stopped working permanently after 2 weeks. But pairing of both earpieces with an iphone 8 had been hit-and-miss from the beginning. Pairing with laptop nigh on impossible. Also be aware the case is bulky in the pocket and difficult to open (needs fingernails), but I wouldn’t have changed them for this alone had they worked. Sound quality when they worked was average and level was OK but not uber-loud. Fit for me was good.
customer_reviews.author: Cranleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a little while and I would say the sound quality is good could use base a little better I like the battery life very good compared to some of the others brands out there and it sounds a lot better and less tinny than some of the other I would use this as a backup because it just lacks a little bit of base but I would use them again just not as my main headphones but overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Was presently surprise
customer_reviews.text: These are great head phone minimal design was what I was looking for and I was willing to sacrifice battery and sound to get it and there was no way I would give any money to Apple for air pods. But I didn't have to the battery life is really good nor run them down to empty yet and the sound is plenty loud and clear enough I'm very pleased with them and happy I went with these rather then air pod clones. I would recommend this product to anyone. You wont be disappointed I have been using them 2 weeks so far and all is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great product  great service  good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some.e of these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them and uses them every day. Bought mine last week and I sm so pleased I did. They have good tone and connect up to bluetooth devices easily. Battery time is good and the supplier is keen to keep you informed in case of any problems. I use mine at the gym and they stay in ear well. Great product great service good price!
customer_reviews.author: Dubaideb

customer_reviews.title: Working correctly
customer_reviews.text: When I read the Reviews I thought these were the right choice No there Not apart from keep cutting out and hard to connect the sound is so low quality No Depth No Bass No Detail I Have Returned these they are incapable of Doing what they say they will Do The only Thing is you have to Pay for the Return (even when there Faulty) and try and claim it back Go for a Better Quality and don’t follow Update on the last I have now received a Good set that works Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I sent mine back for a refund
customer_reviews.text: This would have been my third pair of TaoTronics earphones but I did have to send them back. I liked the look and the design seemed good but they wouldn’t work. I could only get sound from the left earbud on occasion and the right earbud would not pair at all. I sent them back for a full refund and I’ll wait for any bugs to be worked out before buying another set. Had they worked, the only criticism I had on the shape was that they were smooth plastic and fitted so well into the holder it was difficult to get them out to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eagleburger

customer_reviews.title: Look good but they don’t sound great
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many five star reviews on here I had high hopes for these headphones. They’re easy to set up. The box and design are great. But you try playing piano ballads or bassy rap through them and the distortion on the low notes is unbearable. The bass crackles as if the woofer has burst (or whatever it's called on a headphone this small). it happens regardless of the volume. No good. I've had Taotronics headphones in the past and they've been really good, but I’m very disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Krannic

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these months ago, They've been reliable and have rarely had sync issues. I haven't timed it precisely but the battery tends to last max 5 hours - as stated. Fast charge time. 1 hour approx. Noise cancellation is good. If you'd like strong noise cancellation a set of headphones may be best. The volume control on on the earbuds themselves is good but I find myself defaulting to the sound settings on my laptop often. Good quality earphones at a great value price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for gym especially doing cardio. They are super secure in my ears and they are really comfortable. While jogging, I never felt the buds will fall out. For the price, the sound and bass is fantastic, was not expecting that quality. Plus it did a great job at blocking most of the background noise. The flat style charging cable is a nice bonus. I was able to get about 5 hours of battery life from a single charge, which is about 2 days of usage for me. The case is very small and compact, so you can carry it around easily without being a burden.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. M. Abdo

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones poor voice call quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of bluetooth earphones from tao tonics I have purchased. Comfy, light and good sound quality when playing music, with a decent bassline. They connect quickly and have a good range. The sound quality during calls is poor as people struggle to hear me all the time. This was not a problem with the tao tronics sporty bluetooth earphones. Not sure if this a problem with just my pair as the other reviews dont highlight this as a problem. Fair for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tai B

customer_reviews.title: Faulty? Please read
customer_reviews.text: Two bad things I dont know if it's just me but the stuff that keeps the ear buds in the case are so weak that it falls out when it is upside down is mine broken. And the case can snap it two just buy opening. Otherwise I really like them but the ear buds falling out so easily just rewin it. I would really appreciate if I could have a new pair to see if I just got a faulty one. If I got a new one and the ear buds dint fall out then it would be well worth the money and would be a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a few days and they worked okay. Kept falling out of my ear no matter what bud end I used. Then they just stopped working and have not used them since. They failed to pair with each other, failed to pair with my phone. Even if they did pair they would just drop out - realy pain. Not worth it - though they are more expensive, they are worse than cheaper alternatives
customer_reviews.author: sakon

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: For that price point this is an incredible pair of earbuds. Sound quality and features are fantastic. But less than a year in, it's laborious to get them to pair, let alone connect anymore. I've had to reset them every time, and now the right bud has no sound even if they manage to connect. I've registered for extended warranty with their website but they don't even send you a email confirmation so it seems more like an exercise in harvesting your details. I've written them an email, but I don't have much faith! Update. They did get in touch, as a result of this review, to offer a gift voucher or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M L S

customer_reviews.title: Great true wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really rate this brand and all headphones they produce so I gave these a go and they have been great. No dropping out like other true wireless headphones on Amazon. Dont get me wrong maybe once a week the right one will drop out for a second but other than that they have been great. My only grip is they do slip out my ear slowly when walking even with the biggest ear buds. Would love it if they could add the sports hook to later editions.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I came across these after a friend had bought some of the over ear headphones and said how good they were. I'd briefly looked at Bluetooth headphones before but had been put off either by the price or the poor battery life. For £28 these look good, sound great and (especially combined with the charging case) have excellent battery life. I can't fault them other than I found the supplied buds quite uncomfortable so have replaced them with some spare ones I had from other headphones but that's a small complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Dom  Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a year and use them everyday for work/general use and they have lasted wonderfully and are still going strong. By all means they haven't had an easy time of it, I've dropped them multiple times, being a clumsy human and they are still working, granted they have developed a rattle. The buds themselves are of an okay quality but the case could do with some improvement, again being the clumsy person I am, have dropped the case a few times which makes the buds go flying. The led charging indicator isn't very clear but does the job. For a cheaper alternative I can't fault them, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These give a great sound (tbh, I use them with comply tips, which unfortunately means i have to remive the tips for the to fit the case). Yes GREAT sound regardless of price. They did feel insecure with any of the supplied tips, so I used some compmy tips which i already had, and they are well secure, and they leak much less sound in or out!! Who needs noise cancelling?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. A+ value for money. More than I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Definitely feels a lot more premium than the bargain price they cost. There's a couple very minor things I don't like (lack of ability to pair/unpair without putting back in case, sometimes the touch controls are just annoying and get used by accident), but anyone who expects perfection at this price is clueless anyway. In terms of convenience, style, audio quality (especially with some custom buds, easy to buy on Amazon), battery life - I couldn't have asked for more. I never have any desire to use my wired Bose QC15s when I could use these instead.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Been using these buds for a few days now so this is an early review. I'll update if anything changes. They fit snuggly into your ears and don't feel like they will fall out even when I'm sweating a lot on a running machine in the gym. The sound is good, they do a great job of blocking out external sounds and had decent bass. Making calls is ok, a limitation of these buds means outside they will pick up on wind sounds. Inside as they block up your ears so well you tend to shout a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bad boy Beddoe

customer_reviews.title: Was ok while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: For its price, it did the job. Set up was simple, sound quality was ok for the price, and you get used to them in your ears after a while Battery life was fine. However, earphones started constantly disconnecting and reconnecting from each other (not from phone) even when in the case (fails to disconnect from phone and switch off) after 5 months of use so don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Will Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones.... When they work
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really impressed by these headphones but I've used them a few times now and they just keep cutting out or turning off mid work out. Its really hard to get the two buds to sync with each other so music often only comes out of one ear. They've now started just to say "power off" and stop working which is fine if you're near the base as you can put them back in and start again but if you're out on a run you're stuck with no music until you get home. Tbh not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Est

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but for me, they kept falling out. tried different tips but it felt like they were just being forced into the ear canal and so was very uncomfortable. This was the main noise cancelling effect, simply blocking the way in for any noise! Occasionally the right piece dropped the connection to my phone. Based on all the reviews it must be a me problem but I just couldn't get it on with them.
customer_reviews.author: nick c

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: It's great value for money. It's nicely built, black and discreet. The sound quality is not bad, maybe a bit too much bass, but overall good. And it also isolates well the outside noises and fits nicely in your ears. Will certainly give it a extra star for the customer service that has has gone an extra mile to achieve customer satisfaction with their product. This product won't get the five stars only for the Bluetooth connectivity. If you have other stuff connected as well as the headphones (on my computer I have a mouse and keyboard for example) connection doesn't work very well. But works fine in my phone. It's also not very clear on calls.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: awesome value earbuds
customer_reviews.text: have to say, these are every bit as good as apple for sound. Truly surprised by the quality and comfort of fit. Charge and run time may not match up to some, but in reality, it is plenty. touchy control are a littel fiddly for me, but that goes with all these devices I think. Nothing specific to these. For the money, absolute no brainer. Did I mention it is a no brainer....
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Gane

customer_reviews.title: Premium product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sounded a little quiet until I figured how to use volume up (tap the right bud). I'm no audiophile but the sound quality of these matches any wired in ear headphones I have owned. Connection is fast, will generally connect to your device by the time you get them in your ears. My biggest worry was comfort, happy to say there are no problems, you barely feel them as they are so comfortable and come with some different size plugs depending on your lugs. Best of all they stay securely in place. All in all really happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Clarky

customer_reviews.title: Mine were defective, no seller support, returned
customer_reviews.text: Sound kept going from left to right to left bud which was nauseating. When working briefly this sound was fine only a little background hum. Messaged the seller to say there was a problem but no response at all (well over48 working hours later. Returning for a refund. Maybe just mine were defective and others are good, but if yours are not my experience says you’ll have no support.
customer_reviews.author: Pentastic

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a few days but they are brilliant. Light and comfortable, sound great, have good volume levels and great passive noise cancelling with the buds. The build quality is great. The case is lightweight but sturdy, the lid snaps shut and is kept closed magnetically in the same way the buds are kept in place in the case when stored or charging. They connect to my phone almost instantly when removed, much quicker than other buds I've used I've used them in a noisy gym, and for phone calls without any issues. In my opinion they are the best buds I've used and are a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: WS & LJS

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than the price tag would suggest
customer_reviews.text: I find buying ear buds to be very hit and miss; there are so many on the market now of varying quality, style and comfort levels that there’s always a risk with any purchase. This said, these really do fit the bill for me. They are light, comfortable, sound great (used mainly for watching tv shows on my commute) and the in-case charger means that last for ages. The only slight downside is that I would have wanted slightly better noise cancelling. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Yup, I’m loving them
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these. Great for using on the train and under my motorcycle helmet for listening to sat nav. Haven’t tried a call with them as I would need access to them to answer the call etc as I dont have a holder for my phone so it lives in my pocket. I would say a little more volume would be good but I guess it’s looking after my ears no going too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Budget headphone with great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with the superb quality bass these speakers are offering. I love to use these while going in the gym. One more amazing feature is that it can answer and hang up calls by just tapping on the earbuds instead of picking up your phone when it is few feet away. It can be used for upto 5 hours in one charge. It comes with the mini charging case. Overall I’m happy to use it.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wireless headphones. Very quick and easy to pair with any Bluetooth device. Used for walking and quiet moments of listening to music at home. Good fit, noise cancelling reasonable, sound quality good and the battery life so far, very good with the recharging from the pod station. The only downside so far is the ‘touch’ controls which are a little temperamental . Other than that very good Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little wireless ear pieces. Come in a nice compact charging box. This connects to a USB. Nice sleek design. Great sound quality and the noise cancellation is spot on. You can control the volume from the ear piece and they provide a good bass sound. The Bluetooth is fantastic and they were easy to pair up with my device. The ear pieces fit nicely in the ear. Soft and comfortable. These have been great for listening to music and audio books.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki T.

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless earphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking wireless earphones. Fit in my ears perfectly and look pretty good. They do have some ‘noise cancellation’ but it’s not 100% and noise from noisy traffic, the tube, buses and flying airplanes can be heard. Sound quality can be hit and miss, however, they serve there purpose which is to listen to my music and stay in my ears when I workout. I think for the price they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life on these are amazing. Sound quality is great, controls by using different taps works well, case is well made and charges buds when not in use. They connect instantly when taken out of case, and show battery percentage on phone. LED lights on case give battery level indication of the case battery. Can use one or both at same time, great for phone calls as well. Best earphones I have bought so far. Only negative is noise cancellation is just from using the silicone tips, it's not actually electronic noise cancellation. Con - should be USB-C for charging.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great Sound...whats not to like
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of TaoTronics for years and this set of blue tooth earphones confirms my faith in the brand. Crisp accurate sound with good bass and good noise cancelling means you only hear what you should. Comfy to wear( i use mine on 4hr + MTB rides) and connect faultlessly to my phone every-time. Battery life is great and they charge up using the supplied case which is sturdy and does a great job of protecting the hardware. For the price i have not found a better set of everyday robust plugs , I highly recommend these if your in the market for some, you cant go wrong at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a pair of Taotronics over ear noise cancelling headphones and I am super happy with them, so had no hesitation in ordering these as I expected the quality to be similar and I wasn't disappointed. Just like my over ear headphones, the battery life is great and they charge really quickly. Sound quality is good and I had no problem pairing them to my Samsung S8. Overall great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Payne

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality quite good for this price, but as for all in-ear buds, will depend on how well they fit your ears. No active noise cancellation, but with the correct size ear bud, effective passive noise cancellation. No problems pairing with iPhone and Echo. Not used a lot but battery still on first charge. Nice small case, big fingers might find it slightly fiddly to remove ear pieces from case.
customer_reviews.author: bayboy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!👍👍
customer_reviews.text: The earpods don't really do cancellation, more suppression. They are really comfortable and I am very impressed with the sound quality both for music and voice (for podcasts). I use them with an android phone but would expect similar performance on iOS. Battery like proving really good so far and the handy recharge in the case is really helpful too. All in all a great product for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I was pleased with last 2 taotronics purchases. I do now regret buying these. Will not pair with HP laptop (can pair either of buds but not both). Pairing is also erratic with my Samsung S10, first time was ok, second time it paired to both buds with volume controls for each bud...hopeless. When they work the sound quality is very good, but overall would not recommend, my search for good value wireless buds continues...
customer_reviews.author: JonF

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is superb.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot emphasize enough how good these are.noise isolation with the original tips is good but add some foam tips and you will be blown away,very clear sound and good levels of medium and base.I had to change the tips to something that will fit me even though you get 4 sizes with the earbuds.its just my ears they are a bit (weird:))but once I got some to fit they are absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sorin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to these from bluetooth ones that are wired together that you put round the back of your head. The quality of these is not diminished at all, they're more convenient to use, and best of all, the case is so small and compact I keep it on me to store them it, but it charges the headphones while they're stored, so it's like carrying a battery pack for your headphones with you! For this price i'd recommend. Anecdotally, these are massively more comfortable in your ear that airpods, and the quality is no worse - why pay 5/6 times more?
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Can't use them to talk on phone
customer_reviews.text: I loved my previous taotronics headphones. So I decided to go with the same company again when i wanted wireless headphones. They work pretty well for listening to music or podcasts. They stay in place when i go for a run or exercise which is great. The only problem i have is when i wanna use them for talking on the phone. The other person cant't hear me and i need to take them out and use my phone. Not the most convenient to say the least. I am considering buying a different pair in the near future to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Natasa Trigonopoulou

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Still getting to grips with the controls but really nice fitting comfortable headphones. Instructions were quite basic and it took me a while to work out the left bud has to be removed from the case first or else they won’t connect to each other. Haven’t had them long but charge seems to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: L P Ford

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting such a surprise after reading the reviews but I was wrong. The right ear bud just won't snuggle in even changing the bud size it always felt like it was abit loose than the left unless my right ear is bigger. The touch controls were laggy and did not respond well. The sound was average but on loud volume it felt like the right bud was making crackly noises. Really disappointed straight return.
customer_reviews.author: Haroon khan

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these, they were so slick, so comfy, and great sound quality. But after 3 months, the right earbud does not connect. The sound works, it beeps. But it won't play music. Only the left one!! I have reported this to Amazon as it's unacceptable. They also do fall out when I am at the gym so I need to keep pushing them in - but I always have this problem with in-ear buds...
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the prime day sale. Have used twice so far to listen to pod casts on work commute. Flawless performance so far, decent sound and blocks out alot of back ground sound too. Comfortable in my ears and haven't shifted so far. Neat little box to charge in and keep them in when not in use. Look good too. My last pair of true wireless earphones by powerlocus were very stuttery and always cutting out, lets hope these ones keep on being great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pennock

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds in the market !
customer_reviews.text: Guess this is the best wireless Bluetooth ear buds in the market. Battery is great, simple & quick pairing, useful manual, can hear in both the side in a conversation, noise cancellation works well, music output is great... for the price, I doubt one can get any better than this. Amazon would certainly confirm this statement, I have been buying and returning Bluetooth ear buds for the last 6 months and finally bought this though there were no previous reviews and it’s worked. Highly recommend this...
customer_reviews.author: Arun Chandrashekar

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good for the price. Holds charge well and is easy to recharge. I've tried a few different "cheap Chinese" brand Bluetooth earbuds, mostly to experiment with different shapes (as my Samsung earbuds become uncomfortable after wearing for longer than half an hour. Found this particular shape more comfortable with better weight distribution. Annoying that the headphones can't be turned on/off without placing back in the case for a moment, but very rare that is an issue. Very good build quality of case and bud. Overall, a good quality earbud with very good sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robsano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, great sounds, my teens love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we've bought, for our second daughter. The sounds is excellent, nice deep base, and they hold their charge well. My daughters love them. Good range both from the phone, and each other (they wear one each sometimes, wandering around the house. Well worth owning. I rate Taotronics very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve SD

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a few months.....
customer_reviews.text: I've had these nine months, and for most of that time they've worked as expected: no connection issues, good sound quality, etc. However over the past few weeks, even after multiple factory resets, the earbuds just will not connect to each other. I can use each individually, with the same sound quality as before (albeit mono rather than stereo), just never both at the same time. I've tried on multiple phones and laptops, so I know its the earbuds that are at fault. Shame really. Has to be 1-star as I expect headphones to last many years, not just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ramsden

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get right earbud to work
customer_reviews.text: Right earbud came faulty, no matter what I do, it doesn't pair with the left bud, I've just spent the last hour trying to get it to work, I've reset them, tried single mode then to couple, nothing no matter what I do, only left works. On top of that, as per documentation, single mode only works with left earbud, so cannot use right bud when left is charging, what the hell?
customer_reviews.author: Jose David Garcia Llanos

customer_reviews.title: I'm so impressed with these earpods!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of true wireless earpods from another amazon seller for £18 and when they arrived they were terrible. Awful connection issues and sound quality. I bought my current headphones from TaoTronics a couple of years ago and I still use them today and I've been impressed with quality and decided to spend a bit more on a brand I know and have had great products from before. I can't believe the quality of these earpods. I'm listening to songs I've heard thousands of times and getting a new found love for them and noticing things I've never heard before. Best money I've event spent on audio equipment hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones. Great company and service.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb headphones for a fraction of the price than Apple AirPods and in my optimising perform and look just as good. I prefer the black look to the white AirPods anyway. Have been using them for a few months and work perfectly with instant pairing. The only slight downside is the headphones pick up background noise when I’m on a phone call in a noisy area but this is a minor point. Overall highly recommended! pS I haven’t been paid to write this as some on amazon are.
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse International

customer_reviews.title: Awful sound!!! Noise cancelling simply doesn't exist!
customer_reviews.text: Awful sound awful!!!! I am sooo tired of trying to put the volume up!!!!! I have taotronics headphoned which work perfect with the same devices however those earphones are awful. Doesn't worth even £1!! I so regret buying them. Perfect battery life but it doesn't matter when you can't use them PROPERLY. ULDATE: I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sh.

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones!
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of getting the Apple ones but they were out of my budget and I wasn't sure if these ones would be any good but I was pleasantly surprised and it far exceeded my expectations. They were quick to connect and the sound and battery life is really good. I like the case too and how they magnetically connect to the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rafiq

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: TaoTronics good quality products, have previously bought their products before, always been happy. First time I have bought their earbuds, they are well made, sound quality is good, volume strong, and are comfortable to wear. Fraction of the cost of Apple's earbuds. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: exdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Good then bad....
customer_reviews.text: These worked well at the start, however after a month or so they stopped connecting to each other and showing up as 2 separate headphones resulting in only one bud working at anyone time. Sending back for refund not great resolution if I’m honest. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great price.
customer_reviews.text: easy to use headphones that are comfortable and secure when running. Easy to use just 1 for listening at work or if you want to hear what is around when walking. Connection is easy and connect instantly with my phone or laptop. Great microphone for use with calls or voice control. All around impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alex williams

customer_reviews.title: Impressive earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these earbuds a day but I’m impressed with them. The sound quality is great, much better than others I have costing a lot more. The range impressed me. About 50 ft indoors going through multiple thick walls. They fit really well and don’t feel like they are about to fall out, Let’s hope they are reliable. Will post back in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: alan hodgson

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to the mainstream options!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific value for money - they pair with my phone and iPad every time and have never let me down. They last a good while on a charge and are pretty comfortable in the ear. The sound is perfectly acceptable - have definitely heard much worse from much more expensive earphones! Would prefer it if the volume up/down was controlled by keeping finger pressed on the contact point, rather than individual taps to increase or decrease - sometimes I tap too quickly and the headphone interprets that as a ‘stop music’ command. Other than that, no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: C Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several from them over the years. For this price, you won't find anything with better sound and battery life! The bass is rich without losing any mid or low ranges. And very comfortable to wear, yet they stay put very well! I can go for long runs with them. I tried other true wireless ones and they fell off in the first run after 30 min or so.
customer_reviews.author: UserJor

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this earphones after reading some great reviews. They have a major flaw which is a constant hiss in the background. This white noise is extreme distracting and hard not to focus on it. It’s fine if you’re just listening to loud music but any quiet moment the hiss kicks in. Using the earphones to listen to a podcast is a really dire experience, the hiss is a constant annoyance. Shame as the sound itself is very good, they are comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: SoulessMask

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for budget priced Headphones even when compared to mid end 3x the price
customer_reviews.text: Ear cups seem slightly smaller than the last version & I'm assuming that's the case, as I requested replacement earcups only after 18 months use & they replaced the whole lot? Can't mark them down for customer satisfaction as they extended my 1 yr warranty another 18 months. I actually returned some £130 well known headphones as the sound quality and noise suppression wasn't as good as these for pound to pound comparison.
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, Love the design, Color, fits perfectly. Volume is great. Volume controls needs getting use to. Admittedly, I only received them two hours ago, however been testing them non stop. Made many calls and tested almost everything. So far very pleased. Tmrw will test it out on the street, to see how it is when surrounding is loud. But confident it is going to be great. As mentioned, touch controls needs getting use to. beware - if you want to only use one of them (rather on both ears) then it can only be the one for the the left ear. Both ear piece’s linked, left one can work on its own but not the right side.
customer_reviews.author: SVR

customer_reviews.title: Issue sorted
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for a while then the left earpiece failed to work. However the company were very supportive and suggested a reset. This was easy to carry out and the earpiece was then reconnected to the main ear piece. It has been working fine ever since. Good quality sound and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: bez berry

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but connection problems Ear phones powering down or it only plays in one ear.. My left ear is no completely dead. I am unhappy. Customer service was a joke. They say not thing then another I am just going round in circles. Do I had to buy something else
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything feels a little bit cheap, but they are. Audio quality is great.theyre a good fit, not tried during exercise yet however. Battery life is great. No ACtive Noise Cancelling, but passive noise cancelling is good enough. Volume controls are fine. All other controls are awkward and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Good Quality for Money. May not fit small ears
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very easy to use. The pairing to iPhone is seamless. The sound is good for the price and compares well with other in-ear buds. The fit is OK but feels too loose for running or sports. Overall the Buds are bigger than suggested in the marketing photos and you may struggle if your ears are smaller. Battery life is good - I expect to be able to recharge these about 100 times.
customer_reviews.author: Maveric

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Headphones. Nicely packaged. Sound quality and comfort is fantastic. Battery life is superb. Easy to connect. Case also charges the device. Stays in the ear. Comes with charging wire and different ear rubbers. Touch control on the device is really nice. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today so can share my experience. Looking nice sitting comfortable, fast pairing nice sound quality. But volume is to low. I used another version of this company earphones and the volume is higher in 2-3 times. Here i just was badly surprised. Sorry but need to return
customer_reviews.author: Iuri

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but often gets the command wrong
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent but these headphones have a big flaw in that they require tapping to get them to do what you want and they seem to get easily confused and carry out the wrong command. For example if I want to skip to the next song I need to tap three times but it often mistakes this for stopping which is two taps. This happens a lot and is very irritating. Occasionally the headphones don't connect unless you take them out of the charging case at exactly the same moment so sometimes I have to put them back in and start over.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Total bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, connects instantly. Call quality and sound great. Stable connection. Tap controls work fine. Compact case and look great when wearing too. Super impressed, a steal at twice the price. Surprisingly loud max volume and good clarity. Some really cute touches as well like the magnetic clasps on the case and buds to hold them in place.
customer_reviews.author: d139nn

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of wireless earbuds without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Bought for £35.99 which seems like a bargain now I have been using them for a month or so. Pairing is easy, only had one cut-out during a whole month of use (off and on fixed this), battery life is great (both earbuds and the additional charge in the case), sound quality is good. On the topic of sound quality, I have a pair of wired earbuds from B&O. These earbuds, of course, do not match the sound quality, however, I spent a tenth of the price and just needed something for podcasts and music during the commute. If you're looking for a pair of very reasonably priced wireless earbuds, these come highly recommended from me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Headphones stopped pairing with each other
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for the first couple of days. There were some small connectivity issues when outside but I could live with that for the price. Unfortunately what I can't live with is the fact they have stopped pairing with each other and its incredably frustrating. I've tried the solutions mentioned in the manual and couple of additional things suggested by other users but no luck. Because of this I cannot reccomend them and would suggested you look elsewhere. **Update: I have recieved a replacement and they are working a lot better than the first pair. The sellers customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: budget buds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just because they werr on sale at the time .they are comfortable and the sound is nice on them . i use them for phone calls and have been told the sound is not always clear but that could be signal related for music i love them .
customer_reviews.author: PaulBoyoWhite

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These are impressive! Good sound, good fit (comes with a range of ear buds). Light and responsive to touch. Another very impressive product by Tao, i seem to be collecting them. I've only really walked and sat with them, not done any exercise but will give that a go to see how well they still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get these if you want to use the microphone for making telephone calls. The audio for playback is excellent but they do no work to make or receive telephone calls. I have had them replaced with SoundLiberty BH-77 and there is a world of difference- you can actually use the replacement set for making calls and people can actually hear me clearly - but if you are only listening using these BH-53 earphones then you won’t have an issue
customer_reviews.author: Iain Morrison

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need the mic, these are great.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the sound and the convenience of these little earbuds. I own some other blue tooth devices from Taotronics and the sound its great for the value. However the mics on these earbuds are useless. I cannot make calls from these because the person on the other end cannot hear a thing. Tried in public, quiet rooms -- they cannot hear a thing. Shame because i really liked these. had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Funke

customer_reviews.title: One design flaw = almost unusable
customer_reviews.text: You grab your headphones, head out to the shops, take them out for whatever reason and they will eventually switch themselves off. There is absolutely no way to switch them back on with out the charging case. The lack of physical buttons is a real flaw. Having to carry around a case negates the practicality of the headphones. Positives are the sound quality. Absolutely amazing compared to other units I've bought. So if you don't mind filling your pockets with the case, your keys, wallet and phone these are the headphones for you. If not... look for units with physical buttons.
customer_reviews.author: UCS

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Recommend by a colleague. The purists amongst us will always find something to critique, however if you want a quality pair of realistically priced Bluetooth ear buds that sound great then you won’t go wrong. Worked as advertised straight out of the box. Faultless pairing. Capability to use just one bud if required ( has to be the left one) automatically pairs with the right bud if subsequently taken out of the charging / carry case. Fit, form and function are great. Quality weight and feel. Why pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Duff the Dawg

customer_reviews.title: A bargain at £25. Consider options if more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for £25. Also bought the upgraded version to this the following day. The long extension can get caught on a coat with a high collar if travelling. Great for gym use as there are no audio drop outs. Use mainly as a second pair to leave in bag when travelling. Sound quality is good for price. Construction is good for price. Worth £25 but not anymore than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

product_meta.title: Wireless Headphones [2019 upgrade], TaoTronics True Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 Earphones SoundLiberty 53 Earbuds IPX7 Waterproof 40H Playtime Easy-pair Smart Touch Control Stereo Sound with Built-in Mic
product_meta.description: Colour Name:BlackTaoTronics - Technology Enhances LifeTaotronics, a flagship brand under the Sunvalley group, is dedicated to providing superior-quality, reasonably priced electronic products that improve the lives of our customers. From our highly successful range of audio equipment to our bestselling LED lamps, our smart products aim to truly benefit our customer’s daily lives. Offering them an experience they can’t get anywhere else. We strive to develop, innovate and focus on utilizing the latest technology into easy-to-use devices.Technical Specifications: Bluetooth Version: 5.0Connecting Range: 33ftCharging Case Battery Capacity: 650mAhRecharge Time: 2.5hrsEarbuds Playtime: 5hrsTotal Playtime: 40hrsWeight: 1.9ozDimensions: 3.2in x 1.5in x 1inWhat’s in the Box: 2 x Earbuds 1 x Charging Case 6 x Eartips1 x Micro USB Charging Cable 1 x User Guide.
feature_bullets: Superior Audio Quality: TaoTronics SoundLiberty 53 offers a truly natural, authentic sound and powerful bass performance with 6mm dynamic speakers and enhanced bass.
IPX7 Waterproof: High-level water-resistant makes it suitable for sports to prevent water and rain. Ideal for sweating in the gym or running outside.
Single/Twin Mode for All Occasions: with built-in mic in each earbud, you can use a single earbud for working or use the pair to enjoy music alone or share with a loved one.

Charge-on-the go with 40 H Playtime: Up to 5 hours playtime on one charge and a charging case holds multiple additional charges for up to 36 hours playtime. Mini size charging case for easy storing in the pocket.
Smart Touch Control: Answer and hang up calls or access other functions by tapping on the earbuds instead of picking up your phone when it is a few feet away.

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
